Trade/Device Name(s): AutoSure Voice II Plus Blood Glucose Monitoring System
AutoSure Plus Blood Glucose Test Strips
Contrex Plus III Glucose Control Solutions
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): AutoSure Voice II Plus Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AutoSure Voice II Plus Blood Glucose Monitoring System, test strips, and control solutions for home glucose monitoring by lay users with voice-assisted functionality.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, forearm, or palm, for single-patient lay use to monitor diabetes mellitus; not for diagnosis or neonatal use; control solutions validate system performance.
